sentences.sCn: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.sContent: ..."it will not survive" childhood curiosity is a collaboration between child and adult,the surest way to kill it is to leave it alone...
...Only Ford may survive in its current form...
...We tend to think of the Depression as a time when families pulled together to survive huge job losses...

remMethod.val: sur(在…下面) ＋ viv(生命) ＋ e → 在废墟下面活下来 → 幸存

words.tran: 继续存在的；未死的；依然健在的
幸存，残存；幸存者，残存物
活命主义者；成功地活下来的人

trans.tranOther: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

trans.tranCn: 从…逃出，幸免于；从中挺过来；比…活得长
trans.tranOther: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness
